author: epg
msg: (Parser): URI-decode paths and property names with urllib.unquote
before passing to the handle methods.
(uri_encode): Add wrapper for URI-encoding with urllib.quote, for Test.
(Test): Encode paths and property names in the rebuilding the log file.

author: glasser
msg: A different stab at conflicts-only-with-context, a la r31030.  This
time, the context is the actual resolved context, not just "always
original".  Line numbers have been removed; I'll add them back on the
conflict marker lines themselves (rather than trying to describe the
whole hunk-with-context as a single line range, which is not
well-defined if the context is only consistent between two of the
Still only works for in-memory diffs.
The implementation works by swapping in various streams for the
baton's output stream; immediately after printing a conflict, the
output stream is a stream which prints exactly
SVN_DIFF__UNIFIED_CONTEXT_SIZE lines, and anywhere else, the output
stream is a "context saver" which remembers the last
longer have to delay printing the hunk to count lines.  Add
(output_merge_token_range): Document the assumption that the output
stream is written once per line.
in the leading and trailing context.  Adjust expected output of
"only" test so that it passes (for memory diffs).

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r30961, fix a doc string for a file private helper function.
